channel.title: jolla on Fossix
channel.description: Recent content in jolla on Fossix

item.title: Sending SMS from the command line in Jolla
item.description: A shell script to send SMS from the command line interface of sailfish.. and also see the Easter egg inside sailfish

item.title: What next after buying Jolla
item.description: Got a Jolla Sailfish phone? Congrats and welcome to the non-android, non-IOS, a pure traditional Linux OS liking community. Learn to hack your phone, its fun and its in the spirit of the OS and community.
